about_the_game:
Take a sneak peek into Love Esquire's production with this digital artbook! Whether you're a fan of the game or a fellow developer, you'll surely enjoy and learn from the thoughts and experiences we've shared in this book!

Disclaimer: The artbook contains MAJOR spoilers. It is advisable that you finish at least 1 playthrough of the game before reading.

Features:

  • At least 100 pages discussing the evolution of the game's art and production process.
  • Several insider information/trivia about the game that we only disclosed here!
  • Lots of juicy CGs! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

You can find the artbook inside your Steam game folder.

content_descriptors.notes: This artbook contains lots of sexy and juicy fanservice illustrations. No genitals are shown.

This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, places and incidents are either products of the author's imagination or are used fictitiously. Any resemblance to actual events or locales or persons, living or dead, is entirely coincidental.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Love Esquire - Digital Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Take a sneak peek into Love Esquire's production with this digital artbook! With over 100 pages, several insider information/trivia about the game are only disclosed here!
